name: USCoreFamilyMemberHistoryRecorderExtension
title: US Core FamilyMemberHistory Recorder Extension
description: Individual who recorded the family member's health history and takes responsibility for its content. Because the recorder takes responsibility for accurately recording information in the record, the recorder is the most recent author. The recorder might or might not be the asserter.

element.short: Who recorded family member's health history"
element.definition: Individual who recorded the family member's health history and takes responsibility for its content.
element.comment: Because the recorder takes responsibility for accurately recording information in the record, the recorder is the most recent author. The recorder might or might not be the asserter.
